# Create an In-App Purchase Review Screenshot

**Web Service Endpoint**

Reserve a review screenshot for an in-app purchase.

## Endpoints

- **Read In-App Purchase Review Screenshot Information**: Get information about a specific review screenshot for an in-app purchase.
- **Commit a Review Screenshot for an In-App Purchase**: Commit an uploaded image asset as a review screenshot for an in-app purchase.
- **Delete a Review Screenshot for an In-App Purchase**: Delete an image that you uploaded for review of an in-app purchase.
